imdb.plot outline: A young boy named hammad comes to Islamabad after getting education in USA. In engagement of his driver's daughter he see imaan daughter of imaam and fell in love with her. Hammad insist his sister (driver's daughter) for a meeting with imaan and then he fell in love with imaan. Hammad told his perants to ask imaan's father for marriage of his daughter with him. But instead his parents insulted imaan's father. After this Hammad goes to imaan's for apologise but he insulted Hammad and told him that he is not good for his daughter because he and his family is arrogant bacause of money they have. Then Hammad leaves his home and works as a porter on railway station. After some weeks imaan and her family goes for a wedding and when they reaches station imaan saw Hammad works as a porter. After this incident she blames herself for all the things happened to hammad. One day she wrote a letter to Hammad to go back to his family but he refuses then she goes herself to meet hamad when her sister told him to do so. But things goes more complicated then and Hammad again refuses to go back. After this incidence imaan fell in love with hammad. Also imaans father fix a date for marriage of imaan with his nephew. One day imaan suffers from fever due to her love towards Hammad and her responsibility towards her father. When she is not getting well then imaan's fathers finally sends his nephew to call Hammad to imaan and when gammad comes imaan sees Hammad with a smile and then she died. Seeing imaan died Hammad also died with a pair of pearls of imaan's sandal in his hand.
imdb.title: Khuda Aur Muhabbat
plot: A young college graduate from a modern elite family from Islamabad falls in love with the daughter of an Imam.::Sara

A young boy named hammad comes to Islamabad after getting education in USA. In engagement of his driver's daughter he see imaan daughter of imaam and fell in love with her. Hammad insist his sister (driver's daughter) for a meeting with imaan and then he fell in love with imaan. Hammad told his perants to ask imaan's father for marriage of his daughter with him. But instead his parents insulted imaan's father. After this Hammad goes to imaan's for apologise but he insulted Hammad and told him that he is not good for his daughter because he and his family is arrogant bacause of money they have. Then Hammad leaves his home and works as a porter on railway station. After some weeks imaan and her family goes for a wedding and when they reaches station imaan saw Hammad works as a porter. After this incident she blames herself for all the things happened to hammad. One day she wrote a letter to Hammad to go back to his family but he refuses then she goes herself to meet hamad when her sister told him to do so. But things goes more complicated then and Hammad again refuses to go back. After this incidence imaan fell in love with hammad. Also imaans father fix a date for marriage of imaan with his nephew. One day imaan suffers from fever due to her love towards Hammad and her responsibility towards her father. When she is not getting well then imaan's fathers finally sends his nephew to call Hammad to imaan and when gammad comes imaan sees Hammad with a smile and then she died. Seeing imaan died Hammad also died with a pair of pearls of imaan's sandal in his hand.::Anonymous
